title: Turtle until 40 minutes.

replies.body: Theres plenty of viable champions/strategies to stop turtling already. Nerfing the late game stuff would reduce the viable champion pool more.

That only works for full late game comp anyway, which they're supposed to do that if most or all of them are heavy late game centric.

And so, kill them in early game and split push so there is no where for them to run, which is definitely viable. 

There is a reason to why late game champs don't appear much in pro scenes

If you don't like it, split push.
Force the enemy team to go entirely to either bot lane or top lane and have one of your team take out their inhibitor on the other side of the map.
